flawed_nl_solution:
She has 180 minutes to do work because 3 times 60 equals <<3*60=180>>180
She has already spent 153 minutes on homework because 45 plus 30 plus 50 plus 25 equals <<45+30+50+25=153>>153
She has 27 minutes to finish her project because 180 minus 153 equals <<180-153=27>>27.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 150, not 153. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
